author: fielding
msg: Do not send irrelevant bits by default.

author: fielding
msg: Do not send trash out on every single error message that has no
relevance to the error and contradicts the HTTP standard.

author: slive
msg: Add the rest of the error docs to httpd-*.conf.

author: rbb
msg: Add the openssl/include/openssl directory to the INCLUDES variable.
This allows us to remove the openssl from the #include lines in the
mod_ssl files.  This makes it easier to use a different SSL library,
with fewer changes to the mod_ssl files.
